si.title: சஷீந்திர ராஜபக்ஷவுக்கு கடும் சிக்கல்
body_lines: නඩුව ඇසෙන තෙක් කොළඹ ප්රධාන මහේස්ත්රාත් අසංග එස්එස් රැඳවුම් භාරයේ තබා ගත යුතු අතර නඩුව අවසන්.. போதரகம முன்னிலையில் இன்று (26) ஆஜரான இலஞ்சம் அல்லது ஊழல் பற்றிய சார்த்துரைகளைப் புலனாய்வு செய்வதற்கான ஆணைக்குழு கோரிக்கை விடுத்தது.
ශ්රී ලංකා පීඒ හි දේශපාලන කාර්යාලය. 8,850,000.00 ක වන්දි ගෙවීම සඳහා රජයේ නිලධාරීන්ට බලපෑම් කරමින් රාජ්ය වත්කම් අනිසි ලෙස භාවිතා කරමින් ඔහු අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන ප්රශ්න කර තිබේ.
අල්ලස් හෝ දූෂණ විමර්ශනය කිරීමේ කොමිෂන් සභාව තවදුරටත් විමර්ශනය කරන තෙක් ඇප ප්රතික්ෂේප කරන ලෙස ඉල්ලා සිටිමින් පරීක්ෂණ අවසන් වන තෙක් ප්රශ්න කරන ලෙස ඉල්ලා සිටියේය.

During the public agitation on 09.05.2022, when it was filed by the Commission to investigate the issue of bribery or corruption, when it was issued by the Commission to investigate the demand for a complaint that the property was damaged, including that the property was owned by the government, and that the property was owned by the government, and that the property was owned by the government, and that the property was owned by the Mahaweli Authority.
මහේස්ත්රාත්වරයා නියෝග කළේ සැකකරු අදාළ ඉල්ලීම සම්බන්ධයෙන් සැකකරුගේ කරුණු සලකා බැලිය යුතු බැවින් පසුව පැමිණිල්ල විභාග කරන ලෙස නියෝග කළේය.. ඒ අනුව දෙපාර්ශ්වයේම කරුණු සලකා බැලීමට එය නැවත කැඳවනු ලැබීය.
නඩු විභාගය අවසානයේ කොළඹ මහේස්ත්රාත් අධිකරණය විසින් 29 වනදා දක්වා රිමාන්ඩ් භාරයේ තබන ලෙස හිටපු රාජ්ය අමාත්ය සෂීන්ද්ර රාජපක්ෂ මහතාට නියෝග කර තිබේ.

en.title: Sasheendra Rajapaksa is a serious problem
body_lines: Colombo Chief Magistrate Asanga SS should be kept in detention until the case is heard and the case is over.. The Commission to Investigate the Investigation of Bribery or Corruption in the presence of Bodarakama today (26).
The political office of the Sri Lanka PA. He has been arrested and interrogated on charges of allegedly abusing state assets by pressuring government officials to pay compensation of 8,850,000.00.

The Commission for Investigation of Bribery or Corruption further requested that he be denied bail and interrogated until the investigation is over, as investigations against the suspect are crimes under Section 139 of the Public Property Act and the Prevention of Corruption Act.

During the public agitation on 09.05.2022, when it was filed by the Commission to investigate the issue of bribery or corruption, when it was issued by the Commission to investigate the demand for a complaint that the property was damaged, including that the property was owned by the government, and that the property was owned by the government, and that the property was owned by the government, and that the property was owned by the Mahaweli Authority.

The magistrate ordered that the complaint be investigated later, as the suspect's facts should be considered regarding the concerned request.. Accordingly, it was called back to consider the facts of the two sides.
At the conclusion of the hearing, the Colombo Magistrate's Court has ordered the former State Minister Sasheendra Rajapakse to be remanded until the 29th.
